mapper.insert: insert into t_order_log (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, ORDERID, PAYSUBJECT, ORDERJSON, TOTALPRICE, ORDERSTATUS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paysubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderjson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_order_log set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYSUBJECT = #{paysubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERJSON = #{orderjson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTALPRICE = #{totalprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERSTATUS = #{orderstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, ORDERID, PAYSUBJECT, ORDERJSON, TOTALPRICE, ORDERSTATUS from t_order_log where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
